title: 打开gui闪退
author: pocketit
txt_content:
本帖最后由 pocketit 于 2019-10-7 10:17 编辑 

用了protocolsupportpe，pc和pe打开gui都闪退
gamemow lost connection: Internal Exception: io.netty.handler.codec.EncoderException: java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: readerIndex(38) + length(1) exceeds writerIndex(38): PooledUnsafeDirectByteBuf(ridx: 38, widx: 38, cap: 256)
插件地址https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=895182&highlight=protocol
下载链接https://pan.baidu.com/s/1YCkUP4k4v8i_w0yfCVeJRg#/

有偿-30r
